content: Well Allan next time you come to Carp, we have a great dentist right next door, really. I have to say though he originally came from one of number of countries seemingly not welcome in the U.S. You could bring Mitch with you and he could have a complimentary assessment. You have to promise and I’m serious about this, make sure he has the necessary documents, and they seem to change frequently, that will get him back into the U.S. with no issues.
